00085 tpContainer<CTYPE>::~tpContainer(void)

00087   if(branches)
00088   {
00089     delete [] branches;
00090   }
00091 
00092   // cerr << "DESTROYING LIST" << endl;
00093 }

00131 template <class CTYPE>
00132 int tpContainer<CTYPE>::AddBranch(const tpContainer<CTYPE> *theBranch)
00133 {
00134   int num_branches=InsertBranch(&(*theBranch), numBranches);
00135 
00136   return(numBranches);
00137 }
00138 
00139 template <class CTYPE>
00140 int tpContainer<CTYPE>::InsertBranch(const tpContainer<CTYPE> *theBranch, const int entry)
00141 {
00142   if(entry<0 || entry=numBranches)
00143   {
00144     char message[MESLEN];
00145     sprintf(message, "Invalid entry specified.\n    ENTRY = %d", entry);
00146     throw clException("tpContainer", "InsertBranch", message);
00147   }
00148 
00149   // Alocate memory for new branch array
00150   tpContainer<CTYPE> *newBranches = new tpContainer<CTYPE>[numBranches+1];
00151 
00152   // Copy old branch array into new array
00153   for(int i=0; i<numBranches+1; i++)
00154   {
00155     if(i==entry)
00156     {
00157       i++;
00158     }
00159     else
00160     {
00161       newBranches[i] = branches[i];
00162     }
00163   }
00164 
00165   // Add new branch
00166   newBranches[entry] = theBranch;
00167 
00168   // Delete old branch array
00169   delete [] branches;
00170 
00171   // Redirect branches
00172   branches = newBranches;
00173 
00174   // Update number of branches
00175   numBranches++;
00176 
00177   return(numBranches);
00178 }
00179 
00180 template <class CTYPE>
00181 int tpContainer<CTYPE>::DeleteBranch(const int entry)
00182 {
00183   if(entry<0 || entry>=numBranches)
00184   {
00185     char message[MESLEN];
00186     sprintf(message, "Invalid entry specified.\n    ENTRY = %d", entry);
00187     throw clException("tpContainer", "DeleteBranch", message);
00188   }
00189 
00190   // Alocate memory for new branch array
00191   tpContainer<CTYPE> *newBranches = new tpContainer<CTYPE>[numBranches-1];
00192 
00193   // Copy old branch array into new array
00194   int j=0;
00195   for(int i=0; i<numBranches; i++)
00196   {
00197     if(i!=entry)
00198     {
00199       newBranches[j] = branches[i];
00200       j++;
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204   // Delete old branch array
00205   delete [] branches;
00206 
00207   // Redirect branches
00208   branches = newBranches;
00209 
00210   // Update number of branches
00211   numBranches--;
00212 
00213   return(numBranches);
00214 }
00215 
00216 template <class CTYPE>
00217 tpContainer<CTYPE>* tpContainer<CTYPE>::GetBranch(const int entry) const
00218 {
00219   if(entry<0 || entry>=numBranches)
00220   {
00221     char message[MESLEN];
00222     sprintf(message, "Invalid entry specified.\n    ENTRY = %d", entry);
00223     throw clException("tpContainer", "GetBranch", message);
00224   }
00225 
00226   return(branches[entry]);
00227 }
00228 
00229 /*
00230 ** Assign method
00231 */
00232 template <class CTYPE>
00233 void tpContainer<CTYPE>::Assign(const tpContainer<CTYPE> &source)
00234 {
00235   // Delete all branches if any
00236   for (int i=0; i<numBranches; i++)
00237   {
00238     DeleteBranch(i);
00239   }
00240 
00241   // Copy all branches from source
00242   for (int j=0; j<source.GetNumberBranches(); j++)
00243   {
00244     AddBranch(source.GetItem(j));
00245   }
00246 
00247   // Copy the actual object
00248   SetObject(source.Getobject());
00249 }
00250 
00251 /*
00252 ** Operator methods
00253 */
00254 template <class CTYPE>
00255 tpContainer<CTYPE>* tpContainer<CTYPE>::operator()(const int position) const
00256 {
00257   return(GetBranch(position));
00258 }
00259 
00260 template <class CTYPE>
00261 void tpContainer<CTYPE>::operator=(const tpContainer<CTYPE>& source)
00262 {
00263   Assign(source);
00264 }
